topic.title: Harvester2 Help
topic.section:
The Help document for Harvester2 is designed to assist users in the process of browsing and searching content in the PKP Harvester. It is also intended to serve as a manual for Harvester2 that describes the scope and workings of this software.

This help system is context specific. To learn more about a specific part of the system, click the "Help" link on the particular page you wish to read about.
